## R Markdown

# Use the same name in all types of the models.
To be consistent across projects (or taxa), it is important to use the same names in all the analysis and discussion. Therefore, it would be helpful to discuss whenever talking about any specific topic.

Always use period when discussing the total study year (start-end; e.g., 1992-2021)

File name: complete_data
Site: site
Visit: visit
Year: year
Day: day
Month: month
Date: date
Longitude: lon
Latitude: lat
Year interval: year_bin
Number of visits: nvisit [no underscore (-)]
